釣.definition: to fish with a hook and line; to angle

釣凱子.definition: (slang) (of women) to hunt for rich, attractive guys

釣鉤兒.definition: erhua variant of 釣鉤|钓钩[diao4gou1]

釣魚.definition: to fish (with line and hook); to angle; (fig.) to entrap; (Tw) to repeatedly nod one's head while dozing

釣魚島.definition: Diaoyu Islands, claimed by China but controlled by Japan as the Senkaku Islands, also called the Pinnacle Islands

釣魚臺.definition: Diaoyu Islands, located between Taiwan and Okinawa, controlled by Japan – which calls them the Senkaku Islands – but claimed by China
